com.vector.cfg.automation.scripting.base

Interface IScriptTaskType.IScriptTaskTypeSignature

  • Enclosing interface:
    IScriptTaskType

    @PublishedApi(value=ADDITIONS_ALLOWED)
 @PublishedApiDomain(value=AUTOMATION_IF)
public static interface IScriptTaskType.IScriptTaskTypeSignature
    The IScriptTaskType.IScriptTaskTypeSignature defines the signature of the IScriptTask.call(IServiceContext, Object...) method.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<java.lang.reflect.Type> getArgumentTypes()
      Gets the argument types of the task to execute.
      java.lang.reflect.Type getReturnType()
      Gets the return type of the task to execute.
      java.util.Set<IScriptTaskType.EScriptTaskTypeFeature> getTypeFeatures()
      Returns the IScriptTaskType.EScriptTaskTypeFeatures of this IScriptTaskType.IScriptTaskTypeSignature.

    • Method Detail

      • getArgumentTypes

        @PublishedMethod
 @Nullable
java.util.List<java.lang.reflect.Type> getArgumentTypes()
        Gets the argument types of the task to execute.

        If null, the arguments are variable arguments with no specific type.

        This defines the Object... arguments of the method: IScriptTask.call(IServiceContext, Object...).

        Returns:
        the argument types

      • getReturnType

        @PublishedMethod
 @Nonnull
java.lang.reflect.Type getReturnType()
        Gets the return type of the task to execute.

        If the task returns nothing (void) the return type shall be Void.class

        This defines the return type of the method: IScriptTask.call(IServiceContext, Object...).

        Returns:
        the return type

      • getTypeFeatures

        @PublishedMethod
java.util.Set<IScriptTaskType.EScriptTaskTypeFeature> getTypeFeatures()
        Returns the IScriptTaskType.EScriptTaskTypeFeatures of this IScriptTaskType.IScriptTaskTypeSignature.

        Note: The Set is unmodifiable and could not be changed by clients.

        Returns:
        the type features
